title: Trevor and The Daily Show Crew at the 2019 The Future of Everything Festival
itunes:title: Trevor and The Daily Show Crew at the 2019 The Future of Everything Festival
description:
Trevor and members of his team sit down with The Wall Street Journal's Joanna Stern to discuss the inner workings of The Daily Show at The Future of Everything Festival.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
